body_text:
I don't see any other instances of renderLinkedText being called. Perhaps instead of adding the div.recipe-listing-name here it can be moved to the renderLinkedText function to keep this JSX simple (render={RecipeListing.renderLinkedText}) (Note that a different name for the function may be more suitable too).
If renderLinkedText is used elsewhere though, disregard this note entirely.
body:
I don't see any other instances of `renderLinkedText` being called. Perhaps instead of adding the `div.recipe-listing-name` here it can be moved to the `renderLinkedText` function to keep this JSX simple (`render={RecipeListing.renderLinkedText}`) (Note that a different name for the function may be more suitable too).

If `renderLinkedText` is used elsewhere though, disregard this note entirely.
